TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users deposit Ether using the Deposit function.
TransactionStateContext.CashOutState: When users withdraw Ether using the CashOut function.

ExternalInteractions.DepositFunction: Transfers Ether from users to the contract and logs the transaction.
ExternalInteractions.CashOutFunction: Transfers Ether from the contract back to the user if conditions are met.
